item.title: Details View
item.description: Overview The details view is the official place where all information about a certain content item can be obtained, from top-level to more in-depth. Here the user can watch the content, previews as well as navigate the item’s specific sub-parts. Breakdown The exact layout of this view varies a lot according to the type of content. In this section, we’ll focus on the general areas of information. Please check individual pages for exact information.
